predicate.note: Frames file for 'absent' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: actually a preposition here
example.text: Absent other working capital, he said, the RTC would be forced to delay other thrift resolutions until cash could be raised by selling the bad assets.

example.name: all args
example.text: John absented himself from yet another Propbank meeting.
